channel.title: PostgreSQL on Seasoned & Agile
channel.description: Recent content in PostgreSQL on Seasoned & Agile

item.title: Using GraphQL or REST, that is the question
item.description: This blog has been dormant for too long – it’s time to post another article. In order to live up to the blog title, this article will combine some old and seasoned stuff (PostgreSQL and Shakespeare’s works) with the latest trends for agile developers (GraphQL, asyncio and type hints for Python).
